name: Under no one's roof
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2019, the theme was "Home".

To stop the evil mage from taking over her world, she had to sacrifice her only path home by smashing the teleportation portal. A visual novel that follows the story of a heroine trapped in another world.

You can also play it online in this link:
http://ankanx.se/games/UNOR/
